snippet: For the second time this week, a federal judge on Thursday halted an investigation into possible campaign finance law violations by conservative groups in Wisconsin and Gov. Scott Walker’s campaign committee.
abstract: Federal Judge Rudolph T Randa halts investigation into possible campaign finance law violations by conservative groups in Wisconsin and Gov Scott Walker’s campaign committee.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this week, a federal judge on Thursday halted an investigation into possible campaign finance law violations by conservative groups in Wisconsin and Gov. Scott Walker’s campaign committee.

headline.main: Wisconsin: Judge Halts Campaign Inquiry Again
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: Judge Halts Campaign Inquiry Again
